messages.title: Re-elect
messages.content: Two years ago you elected me as your MP and I’ve been working for you here and in London since then. I voted against Brexit, against Trident, and against Tory austerity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Voted against Brexit and pursued protections for EU citizens post-Brexit.
Made the case for fair pensions, investment in public services, and an end to pension protections.
Pursued environmental issues including EU protections.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s a contest between the SNP and the Tories here in Edinburgh North and Leith.

issues.brexitEurope: Voted against Brexit, pursued protections for EU citizens post-Brexit.
issues.socialWelfare: Made the case for fair pensions, investment in public services, and an end to pension protections.

leaflet.personalStatement: Two years ago you elected me as your MP and I’ve been working for you here and in London since then.

images.caption: A strong voice for Edinburgh North & Leith

leaflet.additionalNotes: Jeremy Corbyn is described as a decent man but his credibility is questioned. Infighting and squabbling have damaged Labour. It’s a contest between the SNP and the Tories in Edinburgh North and Leith.
